txt.en: 'The dead have all been accounted for. The missing have been found. Now is the time to mourn those who fought to the end, and fought so bravely for this great kingdom.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
'Now is the time to mourn those who fought to the end.'
'Soon the march to the Black Gate will begin.'
You should talk to Aragorn, who can be found at his pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.
'Now we rest, for soon the march to the Black Gate will begin.'
Aragorn has decreed that everyone shall break for the remainder of the day and mourn those lives lost in the battle of the Pelennor Fields.
You should talk to Aragorn, who can be found at his pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.
